sentences.sContent: This entails the destruction of the equipment tested, through carbonization of the insulating material.
sentences.sContent_eng: This entails the destruction of the equipment tested, through carbonization of the insulating material.
sentences.sCn: 这意味着测试设备因绝缘部分的碳化而被破坏。

sentences.sContent: The speed and development of carbonization not only depend on factors itself, but also on surrounding environment concerned.
sentences.sContent_eng: The speed and development of carbonization not only depend on factors itself, but also on surrounding environment concerned.
sentences.sCn: 碳化速度和发展趋势，不仅取决于混凝土的自身因素，同时与外界环境条件有关。

sentences.sContent: Modern coal chemical industry has shown a bright future by transferring its basis from coal carbonization to coal gasification.
sentences.sContent_eng: Modern coal chemical industry has shown a bright future by transferring its basis from coal carbonization to coal gasification.
sentences.sCn: 现代煤化工将其基础从煤的碳化转向煤的气化,从而展现了光明的前景。

words.tran: 碳化的，碳酸的；含二氧化碳的
使充满二氧化碳；使变成碳酸盐
碳化；使与碳化合；使成碳
